name: The Batman's Universe (Reevesverse)
description: Matt Reeves' noir-inspired, detective-focused universe centered on a younger, more brutal Batman. It exists as a separate 'Elseworlds' continuity from the main DCU.

media.name: The Penguin
media.timeline_note: This series takes place one week after the events of 'The Batman' and chronicles Oswald Cobblepot's rise to power in Gotham's underworld.

relationships.reason: This is an 'Elseworlds' project that runs concurrently with, but is separate from, the main DCU continuity.
